metadata.title: CVE-2022-34502 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description: Radare2 v5.7.0 was discovered to contain a heap buffer overflow via thefunction consume_encoded_name_new at format/wasm/wasm.c. This vulnerabilityallows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted binaryfile.

criterions.comment: radare2 package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
